title: Business & Finance
text:
Merck is eyeing a purchase of biotech Seagen, a move that would beef up the pharmaceutical giant's cancer-drug portfolio.

---

Most top executives say they think a recession is looming or already here, according to a new survey released by the Conference Board.

---

Vince McMahon stepped aside as CEO and chairman of WWE after disclosure of a board investigation into alleged misconduct.

---

SpaceX fired some employees involved in a letter that criticized CEO Musk and the way the company applies internal rules.

---

The head of Starbucks's North American business is set to depart, as interim CEO Schultz reshapes the company's executive ranks.
